text: Arsene Lupin is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:Arsene Lupin 1917 American mystery film directed by Paul Scardon and starring Earle Williams, Brinsley Shaw and Henry Leone. It based on the character of the French gentleman thief Arsene Lupin.Backer p.161Pictorial History of the Silent Screen, p.138 c.1953 by Daniel Blum. ==Cast== * Earle Williams as Arsene Lupin * Brinsley Shaw as Guerchard * Henry Leone as Guernay-Martin * Bernard Siegel as Charolais * Gordon Gray as Anastase * Logan Paul as Firmin * Hugh Wynn as Alfred * Ethel Grey Terry as Sonia * Billie Billings as Germaine * Julia Swayne Gordon as Victoire * Frank Crayne as Child ==References== ==Bibliography== * Backer, Ron. Mystery Movie Series of 1930s Hollywood. McFarland, 2012. ==External links== * Category:1917 films Category:1910s mystery films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American mystery films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Paul Scardon Category:Vitagraph Studios films
title: Arsene Lupin (1917 film)
